author: Anna Iovine
title: Sex toy sales are skyrocketing because of social distancing

content:
The weeks of social distancing are dragging on. We see our friends on Zoom, and treat our Hinge matches like we're in some Austenian courtship. 
After a while, though, video chats and sexts just don't cut it. Many of us turn to masturbating to not only to re… [+3281 chars]
